constituent: contact, angle, bound up, glass canopy, hood, walking cane, stick, two, insect
koohiiStory1: For insects to get in contact with each other, they need to place their antennae at just the right angle.
koohiiStory2: Wow, he threw that BOOMERANG with such skill, it made CONTACT with that INSECT in mid flight.
readingExamples: 触る (さわ.る), 触れる (ふ.れる)
words:
気触れる(かぶれる): to react to, to be influenced by, to go overboard for
感触(かんしょく): sense of touch, feeling, sensation
接触(せっしょく): touch, contact
触れる(ふれる): touch, be touched, touch on a subject, feel, violate (law, copyright, etc.), perceive, be moved (emotionally)
触る(さわる): touch
